channel.title: Set message when certain character logs in
channel.description: Does anyone know the code for a 508 server for when I log in It sends a message on the chat area that says something like... Owner Mult1spr3 has logged in! ha Help will be appreciated..

item.title: Set message when certain character logs in
item.dc:creator: @Mult1spr3 Mult1spr3
item.description:
@Mult1spr3 wrote:

Now which file where that be… and where do i place it? :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2009, 02:45:06 pm[/size][hr]Is that in login.java cause i cant find p2 just p

Read full topic
item.source: Set message when certain character logs in

item.title: Set message when certain character logs in
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Example;

for (Player p2 : Engine.players) { p2.frames.sendMsg("" + p.playerName + " has logged in."); }

In the method that handles logging in.
